Package com.philips.lighting.hue.listener

Provides the listeners for handling responses from the bridge.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PHBridgeAPIListener
    This interface notifies bridge events of hue SDK towards application.
    PHBridgeConfigurationListener
    This abstract class notifies bridge configuration events of hue SDK towards application.
    PHGroupListener
    This abstract class notifies group events of hue SDK towards application.
    PHLightListener
    This abstract class notifies light events of hue SDK towards application.
    PHRuleListener
    This abstract class notifies Rule events of hue SDK towards application.
    PHSceneListener
    This abstract class notifies Scene events of hue SDK towards application.
    PHScheduleListener
    This abstract class notifies schedule events of hue SDK towards application.
    PHSensorListener
    This interface notifies Sensor events of hue SDK towards application.
    PHTimeZoneListener
